name: Silicon Hill Ventures
overview: Silicon Hill Ventures, LLC, is management firm specializing in assisting American and foreign early-stage companies find funding sources including listing on smaller European stock exchanges. Our mission is to find and secure investment funding for our clients. The investment experience we provide is characterized by high-quality service and high ethical standards. Our goal is to build solid long-term relationships with each of our clients. We work hard to set realistic expectations about and focus all of our resources on meeting those expectations every day. Our team of professionals share a vision of building a successful international advisory firm. Our culture is characterized by European and American values, shared effort and shared reward. This entrepreneurial spirit is guided by the philosophy that satisfying our clients is the key to our success.
